member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder1.AddFontFile
member.summary: Adds references to all the fonts in the specified font file. The method parses the font file to determine the fonts and their properties.
member.param: Font file reference object to add to the set. If the file is not a supported OpenType font file, then a DWRITE_E_FILEFORMAT error will be returned.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder1
member.summary: Contains methods for building a font set.
